sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/paymentStep' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { add } from '../actions/paymentAction' import { Card, ListGroup, Button, Col, Row, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function PaymentDescriptionProduct() { const params = useParams() const { id: productId } = params const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { if (productId) { dispatch(add(productId)) } }, [dispatch, productId]) const payment = useSelector((state) => state.payment) //const { Items } = payment const checkoutHandler = () => { navigate('/') } return ( <>

Donation name: {payment.Items.name}

Category: {payment.Items.category}

Description: {payment.Items.description}

Solution: {payment.Items.Solution}

) } export default PaymentDescriptionProduct
